entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with a few flurries or rain showers changing to rain overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
